verses.text: \w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* Habacuc \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w saw|strong="H2372"\w*.

\w How|strong="H0575"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou wilt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*? \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee suffering \w violence|strong="H2555"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou wilt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w*?

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* hast thou shewn \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* grievance, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* rapine \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w injustice|strong="H0205"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*? \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* judgment, \w but|strong="H1961"\w* opposition \w is|strong="H4100"\w* more powerful.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* torn \w in|strong="H5921"\w* pieces, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* cometh \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w end|strong="H5331"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* prevaileth \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w just|strong="H4941"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* wrong \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* goeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H7200"\w* ye \w among|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*: \w wonder|strong="H8539"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w astonished|strong="H8539"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w work|strong="H6467"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w done|strong="H6466"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w which|strong="H1471"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w believe|strong="H0539"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w told|strong="H5608"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w swift|strong="H4116"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, marching upon \w the|strong="H0853"\w* breadth \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H4908"\w* \w places|strong="H4908"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* own.

\w They|strong="H1931"\w* \w are|strong="H4941"\w* dreadful, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* terrible: \w from|strong="H4480"\w* themselves \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w their|strong="H4480"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w their|strong="H4480"\w* burden \w proceed|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H0398"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w are|strong="H7350"\w* \w lighter|strong="H7043"\w* than \w leopards|strong="H5246"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w swifter|strong="H7043"\w* than \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w wolves|strong="H2061"\w*; \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H0398"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* shall be spread abroad: \w for|strong="H0398"\w* \w their|strong="H0398"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w*, \w they|strong="H0935"\w* shall \w fly|strong="H5774"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w* \w that|strong="H5404"\w* maketh haste \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.

\w They|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* prey, \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* burning \w wind|strong="H6921"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* \w together|strong="H0622"\w* \w captives|strong="H7628"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sand|strong="H2344"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* prince \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* triumph \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* princes \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* laughingstock: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w laugh|strong="H7832"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* strong \w hold|strong="H7832"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* cast \w up|strong="H6651"\w* \w a|strong="H3920"\w* mount, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w take|strong="H3920"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* shall \w his|strong="H2498"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w changed|strong="H2498"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w pass|strong="H5674"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* fall: \w this|strong="H2098"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H2498"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H2498"\w* \w god|strong="H0430"\w*.

Wast thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* beginning, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w one|strong="H6918"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H4191"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*? \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, thou hast \w appointed|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H7760"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H7760"\w* strong \w for|strong="H4941"\w* correction.

Thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* pure \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* thou canst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* iniquity. \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* lookest thou \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w unjust|strong="H5999"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* holdest thy peace \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* devoureth \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w himself|strong="H0413"\w*?

\w And|strong="H0120"\w* thou wilt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w* as \w the|strong="H3808"\w* fishes \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* as \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w creeping|strong="H7431"\w* \w things|strong="H7431"\w* \w that|strong="H7431"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3651"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hook|strong="H2443"\w*, \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w drew|strong="H0622"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w drag|strong="H1641"\w*, \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* net: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H2076"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w offer|strong="H6999"\w* victims \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* drag, \w and|strong="H2076"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2076"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* net: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w through|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w made|strong="H2076"\w* \w fat|strong="H1277"\w*, \w and|strong="H2076"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* meat dainty.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* cause \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* spreadeth \w his|strong="H5921"\w* net, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spare|strong="H2550"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.
